description:
Since we opened the Law Offices of John J. LaCava, LLC, we have recovered millions of dollars on behalf of people who have suffered the unthinkable. In Bridgeport as well as Stamford and Norwalk, Connecticut, personal injury victims find comfort and advocacy from our experienced team of attorneys. We successfully represent clients who have been involved in matters that include motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice and workers' compensation.

The results our law offices have secured speak for themselves. Some of our notable accomplishments include the following:

  • Recovering more than $2 million in a brain injury case
  • Obtaining more than $1 million following a car accident
  • Returning more than $1 million when a child on a bicycle was struck by a car

No matter the size of the case, we recognize that everyone who comes to our office has a story to tell and deserves to be heard. Our attorneys fight for every client as they would fight for their own family members. For their accomplishments, they hold honors such as being added to the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and being listed in The Best Lawyers in America.

Together, the attorneys at the Law Offices of John J. LaCava, LLC, combine more than two decades of experience in courtrooms and around negotiating tables. One of our lawyers formerly worked in insurance defense, giving us an edge when battling providers. To best serve our clients, we offer free initial consultations, offer services in Spanish, and are available on nights and weekends.
